Label.en: Anyway, this item is from the Aztec civilization! We’re not entirely sure what it is… one theory is that it could be worn across the chest!
Label.fr: Anyway, this item is from the Aztec civilization! We’re not entirely sure what it is… one theory is that it could be worn across the chest!
Label.es: Anyway, this item is from the Aztec civilization! We’re not entirely sure what it is… one theory is that it could be worn across the chest!

Label.en: There’s a lot to say about it, including trying to figure out just what it represented!
Label.fr: There’s a lot to say about it, including trying to figure out just what it represented!
Label.es: There’s a lot to say about it, including trying to figure out just what it represented!

Label.en: But what interests me most is what it’s made of!
Label.fr: But what interests me most is what it’s made of!
Label.es: But what interests me most is what it’s made of!

Label.en: Well, the base is made of wood… Spanish cedar wood actually!
Label.fr: Well, the base is made of wood… Spanish cedar wood actually!
Label.es: Well, the base is made of wood… Spanish cedar wood actually!

Label.en: It’s weird that this tree is called this… since it’s native to Central and South America!
Label.fr: It’s weird that this tree is called this… since it’s native to Central and South America!
Label.es: It’s weird that this tree is called this… since it’s native to Central and South America!

Label.en: I guess that’s what happens when you invade a continent and name everything for yourself!
Label.fr: I guess that’s what happens when you invade a continent and name everything for yourself!
Label.es: I guess that’s what happens when you invade a continent and name everything for yourself!
